Text: You absolute beauty!  Many thanks for putting these up... You cant go wrong with a bit of Loudon!

My pleasure. You're probably aware but there's a great Loudon documentary on YouTube at the minute. It's a Dutch documentary but it's all in english and probably the most indepth I've seen over the years.

many thanx, love this guy, if you can just stand there on your own, with just a guitar, and make people laugh and cry the way this man does, then you are a very special person, but . . . do you have 'a live one' to up ? the one with the green sleeve ??
I do indeed!! I'll get that on asap. Cheers.
Too bad that the Career Moves album is incomplete!
